sentences.en: And so began the lone transmutation, in the white artificial academic atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 如是便开始孤独的嬗变, 在善意的假的学术氛围中.

sentences.en: It involves the transmutation of fear within you, first and foremost.
sentences.cn: 它会首先牵动你们的内在恐惧,引起嬗变.

sentences.en: It is about the transmutation work that you are doing on the inside.
sentences.cn: 你是为了你正在做着的内在转化工作而来的.

sentences.en: It is the path of energy transmutation.
sentences.cn: 那就是能量转化的道路.

sentences.en: Online auto - testing can improve the efficiency, reduce artificial transmutation and standardize the testing methods.
sentences.cn: 自动化测试系统方法能提高测试效率, 减少人为误差和人为因数,规范测试方法和标准.

sentences.en: The chance to discover a Northrend transmutation has been increased.
sentences.cn: 领悟诺森德转化的几率提高.

sentences.en: The purpose of this information is to trigger one's personal ancestral karma for forgiveness and transmutation.
sentences.cn: 该信息的目的,是来触发你个人的祖先业力以原谅和转化.

sentences.en: The real act of transmutation can be very difficult.
sentences.cn: 真正的转化行为会是非常困难的.

sentences.en: The study of enterprise transmutation and strategies bears the theoretic and practical significance.
sentences.cn: 在这样的情况下,研究企业蜕变与企业蜕变策略具有理论上和现实上的意义.

sentences.en: The transformation of mediocrity into genius through transmutation.
sentences.cn: 三、借着转变,化庸才为天才.

sentences.en: The transmutation of the elements was no longer the privilege of the radioactive substances alone.
sentences.cn: 元素的衍变不再是放射性物质独具的特点.

sentences.en: They consist of twelve tablets of emerald green, formed from a substance created through alchemical transmutation.
sentences.cn: 它们由十二块翠绿的石板(翡翠)所组成, 通过炼金术转变产生的物质形成.

sentences.en: This transmutation of the old into new life is seen everywhere in China.
sentences.cn: 在中国到处可以看到这种从旧生活转变为新生活的事例.

sentences.en: Transmutation of credit into income is why the profitability of the financial system can be illusory.
sentences.cn: 信贷化为收益的转变,是金融体系的盈利能力之所以不可靠的原因所在.

sentences.en: Transmutation: A Promethean or Pandoran power.
sentences.cn: 嬗变术: 活尸或尸祸的特殊能力.
